comments.author: ramsden@comcast.net
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

the reload and home buttons I have on my navigation bar moved from the left side of the bar to the right.
Download statusbar and greasemonkey moved from the add-on bar to the navigation bar.  Also the add-on bar buttons are now left justified.  I used to be able to position them on the right.

Reproducible: Didn't try




This was caused by upgrading from 4.0 to 4.0.1.
Attempting to reproduce it is more pain than I am willing to go through.
comments.creator: ramsden@comcast.net
